apogen

Class StaticAnalyzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • apogen.StaticAnalyzer

  • public class StaticAnalyzer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is intended to analyze the output info provided by Crawljax and create opportune State classes
    Author:
    Andrea Stocco
